GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: They're not exactly dogs, are they?
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves single article object as requested by article_id

article.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
article.author: rogersop
article.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments as requested for a particular article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment for a particular article_id and returns that new comment to the user if successful

exampleResponse.author: lurker
exampleResponse.body: This is a newly added comment. How marvellous!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: changes the number of votes and returns the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
